c1.name: "All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear..."
c1.descriptionRaw: Masque of the Red Death is further enhanced, the value of the increase is 100%. Additionally, Arlecchino's interruption resistance is increased when she performs Normal or Charged Attacks while affected by the Masque of the Red Death.
c1.description: Masque of the Red Death is further enhanced, the value of the increase is 100%. Additionally, Arlecchino's interruption resistance is increased when she performs Normal or Charged Attacks while affected by the Masque of the Red Death.

c2.name: "All Rewards and Retribution, Mine to Bestow..."
c2.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Blood-Debt Directives</color> are now already Blood-Debt Due when first applied.
When Arlecchino absorbs such a Due, she unleashes Balemoon Bloodfire in front of her, dealing 900% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> and increasing her All Elemental RES and Physical RES by 20% for 15s. This effect can trigger once every 10s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Agony Alone May Be Repaid."
c2.description:
Blood-Debt Directives are now already Blood-Debt Due when first applied.
When Arlecchino absorbs such a Due, she unleashes Balemoon Bloodfire in front of her, dealing 900% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG and increasing her All Elemental RES and Physical RES by 20% for 15s. This effect can trigger once every 10s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Agony Alone May Be Repaid."

c3.name: "You Shall Become a New Member of Our Family..."
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Invitation to a Beheading</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Invitation to a Beheading by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: "You Shall Love and Protect Each Other Henceforth..."
c4.descriptionRaw: When Arlecchino successfully absorbs a Blood-Debt Directive, <color=#FFD780FF>Balemoon Rising</color>'s CD will decrease by 2s and 15 Elemental Energy will be restored to her. This effect can occur once every 10s.
c4.description: When Arlecchino successfully absorbs a Blood-Debt Directive, Balemoon Rising's CD will decrease by 2s and 15 Elemental Energy will be restored to her. This effect can occur once every 10s.

c5.name: "For Alone, We Are as Good as Dead..."
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Balemoon Rising</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Balemoon Rising by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: "From This Day On, We Shall Delight in New Life Together."
c6.descriptionRaw:
The DMG of <color=#FFD780FF>Balemoon Rising</color> is increased by Arlecchino's ATK multiplied by 700% of Arlecchino's current Bond of Life percentage.
For 20s after Arlecchino uses <color=#FFD780FF>All Is Ash</color>, both her Normal Attacks and Elemental Burst gain 10% increased CRIT Rate and 70% increased CRIT DMG. This effect can be triggered up to once every 15s.
c6.description:
The DMG of Balemoon Rising is increased by Arlecchino's ATK multiplied by 700% of Arlecchino's current Bond of Life percentage.
For 20s after Arlecchino uses All Is Ash, both her Normal Attacks and Elemental Burst gain 10% increased CRIT Rate and 70% increased CRIT DMG. This effect can be triggered up to once every 15s.
